sourcesContent:
import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; import {useState} from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; import styled from 'styled-components'; function App() { const [pokemonName, setPokemonName] = useState(""); const [pokemonChosen, setPokemonChosen] = useState(false); const [pokemon, setPokemon] = useState({ name: "", species: "", img: "", hp: "", attack: "", defense: "", type: "" }); const DropDownContainer = styled("div")``; const DropDownHeader = styled("div")``; const DropDownListContainer = styled("div")``; const DropDownList = styled("ul")``; const ListItem = styled("li")``; const searchPokemon = () => {Axios.get(`https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/${pokemonName}`).then( (response) =>{ setPokemon({ name: pokemonName, species: response.data.species.name, img: response.data.sprites.front_default, hp: response.data.stats[0].base_stat, attack: response.data.stats[1].base_stat, defense: response.data.stats[2].base_stat, type: response.data.types[0].type.name }); setPokemonChosen(true); }); }; return (

POKEMON

{setPokemonName(event.target.value)}}/>
Mangoes Mangoes Apples Oranges

)}
); } export default App;
